measures.goal: Keep cases to a minimum from outside sources.
measures.measure: A travel ban is placed on countries based on how well they have the virus under control.

measures.goal: Keep cases to a minimum within the country.
measures.measure: A proof of good health is needed in order to be allowed to go to work, into shops or dine in restaurants.

measures.goal: To slow the spread of the virus
measures.measure: People had to keep a 1 to 2 meter distance as to not infect other people with the corona virus. Facemasks in public are mandatory.

measures.goal: To stop the virus from spreading
measures.measure: When having simptoms you are required to self isolate.

measures.goal: To stop the spread of the virus.
measures.measure: People were asked to work from home as much as possible.
